summary: Based on the actual event of Rowan's carrying a message from President McKinley to Garcia in Cuba during the Spanish-American War. The parts of Dory and Raphalita are added.
cast: Wallace Beery|Barbara Stanwyck|John Boles|Alan Hale|Herbert Mundin|Mona Barrie|Enrique Acosta|Juan Torena|Martin Garralaga|Blanca Vischer|José Luis Tortosa|Lucio Villegas|Frederick Vogeding|Pat Moriarity|Octavio Giraud|Sam Appel|Guillermo Arcos|Josefina Betancourt|Eumenio Blanco|John Carradine|Davison Clark|David Clyde|Andre Cuyas|Art Dupuis|Juan Duval|Alberto Gandero|Fred Godoy|Augustín Guzmán|Rosita Harlan|Dell Henderson|Warren Hymer|George Irving|Carlos Montalbán|Philip Morris|Manuel París|Manuel Peluffo|José Peña|Yorke Sherwood|Count Stefenelli|Romualdo Tirado|Pedro Vinas|Miguel de Zárraga
keywords: spanish american war|year 1898|1890s|character name in title|cuba
title: Un mensaje a García
